roasting_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

casserole.setting: This casserole is used for cooking.

cabinet.setting: This cabinet does not have a door.

oven.setting: This oven has a manual door opening oven. It automatically stops working when food has been roasted.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, cube, table, etc.
state_description.position: the 3d position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of an apple is 0.1
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affiliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 0.5
state_description.content: the content in the corresponding object. It is a nested list that represent the affiliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.door_state: the state of the oven door, e.g., 'Open' or 'Closed'
state_description.work_status: the working state of the oven, e.g., 'On' or 'Off'
state_description.cooked: whether the food is cooked or not, e.g., True or False
state_description.ham_wrapped_by_aluminum_foil: whether the ham is wrapped by aluminum_foil, e.g., True or False
state_description.ham_covered_by_honey: whether the ham is covered by honey, e.g., True or False
state_description.honey_jar_state: the state of the honey jar, e.g., 'Open' or 'Closed'
